price: 70. Si uu ugu digo kan nool (mu'miniinta) oo Weedha (Cadaabka) ugu rumowdo gaalada.
arabic: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيّٗا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: liyundhira man kāna ḥayyan wayaḥiqqa al-qawlu ʿalā al-kāfirīna
